ticket.title: ActiveRecord to_json serialization shall support richer :method interface
ticket.original-body:
Currently there is no way pass arguments to function specified by :method in ActiveRecord to_json interface. This can be supported if :method not only can specify a simple function name but also a block. The interface should look like following:
No argument: foo.to_json(:method => :bar)
With arguments: foo.to_json(:method => {:bar => {|record| record.bar(arguments)})
